name: MEC Valhalla Glove Liners - Unisex
description:
Lightweight, insulated and extremely quick-drying, these liners are hugely versatile as a stand-alone option for high-output activities in cold weather. A layer of Polartec® Alpha sandwiched between the fleece on the back of the hands makes them warm enough for the descent and cool enough when you’re skinning up.Polyester, spandex softshell suits high-output activity as it's flexible and breathable.Warm, breathable and fast-drying Polartec Alpha insulated panels accommodate a wide range of conditions.Synthetic palms are grippy and durable.Soft fleeced interior.Double banded elastic cuffs keep them in place.

        Sustainability
